item.text: You foolish Galatians! Who has cast a spell on you? Before your eyes Jesus Christ was vividly portrayed as crucified!

The <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="3778">thing</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> is this: Did you <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> doing the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">believing</st> what you <st data-num="189" class="">heard</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> you <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="453" class="">foolish</st>? Although you <st data-num="1728" class="">began</st><n id="1" /> with<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, are you <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> trying to <st data-num="2005" class="">finish</st><n id="3" /> by <st data-num="4561">human effort</st>?<n id="4" />

Have you <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> <st data-num="5118">so many things</st> for <st data-num="1500" class="">nothing</st>?—<st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1065 2532">indeed</st> it was for <st data-num="1500" class="">nothing</st>.
Does God then give you the Spirit and work miracles among you by your doing the works of the law or by your believing what you heard?
Just as Abraham believed God, and it was credited to him as righteousness,

<st data-num="686">so then</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778">those</st> who <st data-num="4102" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>.<n id="2" />
And the scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, proclaimed the gospel to Abraham ahead of time, saying, “All the nations will be blessed in you.”

<st data-num="5620">So then</st> those who <st data-num="4102" class="">believe</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="2127" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="4862">along with</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> the <st data-num="4103" class="">believer</st>.
For all who rely on doing the works of the law are under a curse because it is written, “Cursed is everyone who does not keep on doing everything written in the book of the law.”
Now it is clear no one is justified before God by the law because the righteous one will live by faith.
But the law is not based on faith, but the one who does the works of the law will live by them.
Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us (because it is written, “Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree”)
in order that in Christ Jesus the blessing of Abraham would come to the Gentiles, so that we could receive the promise of the Spirit by faith.
Brothers and sisters, I offer an example from everyday life: When a covenant has been ratified, even though it is only a human contract, no one can set it aside or add anything to it.
Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his descendant. Scripture does not say, “and to the descendants,” referring to many, but “and to your descendant,” referring to one, who is Christ.

What I am <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> is <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> The <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> that <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="5071 5144">430</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">later</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="208" class="">cancel</st> a <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="4300">previously ratified</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1513">so as to</st> <st data-num="2673">invalidate</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st>.
For if the inheritance is based on the law, it is no longer based on the promise, but God graciously gave it to Abraham through the promise.
Why then was the law given? It was added because of transgressions, until the arrival of the descendant to whom the promise had been made. It was administered through angels by an intermediary.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> an <st data-num="3316" class="">intermediary</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> party alone, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>.<n id="1" />

Is the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">opposed</st> to the <st data-num="1860" class="">promises</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">Absolutely</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>! <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> had been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> that was <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2227">give life</st>, then <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> would <st data-num="3689" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="1510">have come</st> <st data-num="1537">by</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.<n id="2" />
But the scripture imprisoned everything under sin so that the promise could be given—because of the faithfulness of Jesus Christ—to those who believe.
Now before faith came we were held in custody under the law, being kept as prisoners until the coming faith would be revealed.

<st data-num="5620" class="">Thus</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> had <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3807" class="">guardian</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">until</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we could be <st data-num="1344">declared righteous</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> now that <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> a <st data-num="3807" class="">guardian</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> of you who<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> have <st data-num="1746" class="">clothed</st> yourselves with <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

There <st data-num="1762" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greek</st>, there <st data-num="1762" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3761">nor</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>, there <st data-num="1762" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="730" class="">male</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="2338" class="">female</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.
And if you belong to Christ, then you are Abraham’s descendants, heirs according to the promise.
